UpgradesLeftFlavorText: This enhanced Ice Tower has a larger freeze area and freezes bloons for longer.
The tower freezes so fast the bloons pop once before freezing.
Super cold aura that slows all bloons that come near the tower. In addition the regular freeze effect of this tower has much larger area.
Bloons are frozen so cold that they freeze other bloons that come in contact with them, spreading the freeze like a virus.
UpgradesRightFlavorText: Makes the bloons so cold that they move slowly even after thawing out.
Freezes 2 layers of bloons instead of 1.
Creates razor sharp pieces of ice on frozen bloons, that when popped, fly out and pop more nearby bloons.
Absolute Zero Ability: freezes the entire screen of bloons for 4 seconds. Does not affect MOAB-class bloons.
